body:
Hey everyone,

So, it was beautiful day out on 4/23/15 so I decided to take this panorama and it looks amazing and I wanted to share it with you guys!


Photo was taken on an iPhone 6

If you guys want to share pictures of anything, go ahead. (It has to be appropriate though) 

Bye,
nintendoboy11
